title: The Radavist 2024 Calendar: January
content:
“The Swell” is the first layout of the Radavist 2024 Calendar. It was shot with a Canon R5 and a Canon f2.8 70-200, in the San Rafael Swell, UT. Photographed by John Watson.

“A part of the Colorado Plateau, the San Rafael Swell is a breached geological feature, comprised of two segments: its inner part, known as the Sinbad Country, is underlain mainly by rocks of Permian and Triassic age; the outer part, called the Reef, is formed mainly of resistant sandstone of the Glen Canyon Group of Triassic and Jurassic age. This vignette features buttes and escarpments of the Reef.”

For a high-res JPG, suitable for print and desktop wallpaper*, right-click and save link as – The Radavist 2024 – January. Please, this photo is for personal use only!
(*set background to white and center for optimal coverage)

The mobile background this month is a vertical crop from the same evening. Click here to download January’s Mobile Wallpaper.

The post The Radavist 2024 Calendar: January appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
